categories: Category:Star Wars: Forces of Destiny episodes

nodes.text: "Run Rey Run" is the fifth episode of the animated micro-series Star Wars: Forces of Destiny' second season. It was released on March 19, 2018.

While scavenging inside a Star Destroyer, Rey is cornered by Teedo who is on the hunt for a valuable part. Rey tries to warn Teedo the removal of the part will trigger the vessel's collapse, but he does it anyway and she must help them both escape after Teedo is knocked out by falling debris

Rey is walking through the wreckage on a Star Destroyer on the planet Jakku. She realizes that the place is barely holding together and that she better find what she is looking for and get out quick. Unknown to her, she is being watched by Teedo. While exploring the corridors of the Star Destroyer, Rey finds several discarded metal objects and thinks that these should work perfectly. She finds another object latched to a generator and tries to remove it. Realizing that doing so would unsettle the structure, Rey abandons her efforts.

Before she can leave, Rey finds herself cornered by Teedo, who is armed with a JSP-14 pistol. Teedo demands that she surrender her salvaged objects at gunpoint and Rey reluctantly gives it up. Teedo takes the bag and then sees the remaining object on the generator that Rey was unable to remove. Rey warns him but Teedo greedily removes it, causing the structure to collapse. Rey manages to avoid a falling beam and retrieves her bag. However, she sees that Teedo is trapped under a beam. After freeing him, she carries him on her shoulder as the Star Destroyer collapses around her.

Rey uses a rope to reach the hangar bay with Teedo. They slide out of the Star Destroyer just before the structure comes crashing down. After escaping, Teedo tries to reclaim Rey's bag but Rey reminds him that she saved his life. He reluctantly gives the bag to her. While Teedo grumbles in his language, Rey responds that he is welcome and leaves on her speeder with her salvaged items.
